name: Amazon MP3 Downloader File
summary: Learn about .AMZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: If files do not download automatically, try opening the AMZ file manually in order to initiate their download.
NOTE: The Amazon MP3 downloader was replaced when Amazon Music was released in 2016, which offers music streaming services instead of MP3 downloads.

description: File used by Amazon MP3 Downloader, a program used for downloading .MP3 files from Amazon; contains data used for activating Amazon MP3 Downloader to initiate the download of MP3 files; stored in an encrypted XML format.
